pages.text: Buddysteel armor is unlike any armor in the game. If you have no sets completed, it's as strong as chainmail, but by the time you complete all of them, it will become stronger than even netherite.

pages.title: Enchantments
pages.text: Because of the cards that helped form the buddysteel, the armor can be enchanted with Buddy Binding, as well as all other armor enchantments you'd expect.
